      • crossProduct

        public static double crossProduct(double x1,
                                  double y1,
                                  double x2,
                                  double y2)
              determine the cross product and return negative number if the 2nd
      set of values, p1, are clockwise from the first, p1, w.r.t. origin (0,0).
      
 P2
          .
          .
          .   * P1      <--- P2 is counterclockwise from P1 w.r.t. origin o
          .
          o
      
 P2
                .
        P1 *    .       <--- P2 is clockwise from P1 w.r.t. origin o
                .
                .
                o

      • createPolygonOfTopFWFractionMax

        public static ArrayPair createPolygonOfTopFWFractionMax(float[] x,
                                                        float[] y,
                                                        float[] xe,
                                                        float[] ye,
                                                        float topFraction)
        create an interpolated polygon of area around the peak for the top full width topFraction of max immediately surrounding the peak. For example, this is used to find the centroid of the peak of a Generalized Extreme Value distribution.
        Parameters:
        x -
        y -
        xe - errors for array x, can be null
        ye - errors for array y, can be null
        topFraction -
        Returns:
